text: you
I met Tony during the most difficult
time in my life I was in the process of
a divorce and I was also helping to take
care of my mom who had been diagnosed
with advanced Alzheimer's I had lost my
wife to pancreatic cancer on a wife of
34 years and that summer I was just
lounging around the backyard my
next-door neighbors asked me if I just
wanted to come over to have a drink
Irene was there and they we briefly met
he spent just a few minutes he was very
sad you could tell his wife had just
passed away and I didn't see Tony again
for about two months
I saw Irene outside walking into the
house and we said hello and I asked her
how she was doing I was going to the gym
well the floodgates burst open I burst
into tears crying about the divorce and
that my mom was dying and he looked at
me and and I didn't know quite what to
do so I said it looks like you need a
hug so I gave her a hug and for the
first time in months I felt something
other than despair it just felt so good
to have someone put their arms around me
they doing the week I found a note in my
mailbox inviting me over and I went she
cooked a great meal i went with two
bottles alone not knowing if she liked
red or white he looked petrified I
thought to myself oh my this is going to
be a very long evening but it turned out
to be a wonderful evening one of the
funny things we thought about after the
fact was you're not supposed to meet
people at a you know their house the
first time around neither of us had an
exit strategy but as it turned out we
didn't need one Irene and I would both
everyone's want to say what are we 15
I thought the proposal would come on a
sailboat which just never seemed to work
that spring so I was looking for Plan B
but we went out to on her golf course
and she's a member of a country club and
we got out on the golf course and
immediately he kept asking me what's
your favorite golf hole I don't know
they're all beautiful holes and finally
on the 13th hole which was very
interesting in itself as she said I
really like this whole I think because
it's got a panoramic view of the golf
course and its high looks really well so
it took me seven shots to get to the
green and she doesn't three I was lining
up a pot I turned around and tony was on
one knee with the bring box in hand she
thought I fainted or was having a heart
attack and said I love you will you
marry me of course I said yes
you know the fact that she loves my kids
and I love her kids and her family means
an awful lot for both of us Tony last
year gave me a Christmas card that read
you and I found love when we least
expected it and I just believed truer
words have never been written or spoken
neither one of us were expecting to find
what we found and we found a wonderful
love with very happy
